newsitem.title: USA: Bingo and Gaming says Q4 revenues up.
newsitem.headline: Bingo and Gaming says Q4 revenues up.

text.p: Bingo & Gaming International Inc said Thursday that its unaudited fourth quarter 1996 revenues were $519,940 up from $149,783 for the same period last year.
Revenues for fiscal 1996 were $1,153,018, compared to $623,760 in 1995, it said. It was the first time the company had revenues of over $1.0 million, it said.
It said it expects to release earnings information by the end of March, when its audit is completed.
"We've turned the corner on bringing profitability to Bing & Gaming and we are excited about the prospects for the coming year, said Reid Funderburk, chief executive officer.
